description:
Runako moves back into the neighborhood for school and will live with Eiyu temporarily.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Imouto Chara de mo "Onii-chan" Dakara Otona ni Natte mo Lovecome ni Naranai
Since I`m the Big Brother to the Little-Sister Type, Growing Up Still Won`t Start a Rom-Com
妹キャラでも『お兄ちゃん』だから大人になってもラブコメにならない
